website_summaries.verdict: Attractive chaise lounge that's a good choice for smaller rooms and those who like firm seating.
pros: Sports a trim design that's suitable for areas with limited space
Nailhead trim on the arm is a nice accent
cons: Cushioning is on the hard side, so it's too firm for consumers who prefer soft seating

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: This chaise is great! For the price, it’s really quite nice. I put it together in about 30 minutes, and it easy and the instructions were clear. While it is pretty stiff, it is exactly what I was looking for to fill an empty space in our bedroom. I can definitely see myself relaxing on this seat with a good book. Hoping it loosens up a bit with use, but overall I am very pleased with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly at the end of my queen size bed! Adds a touch of elegance at a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a lounging area to read and watch t.v. I love it!! Its soooo cute. It is not as red as I thought it would be but it is still gorgeous. Fairly easy to put together. I looked at the reviews before hand. It is a bit firm but not as hard as people made it out to be. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kai'

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect I'm a hefty girl but this thing holds me up on my lazy day. SUPER EASY TO PUT TOGETHER! I did it by myself in 15 minutes and it came super quick.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo914

customer_reviews.title: Just add a book and glass of wine..
customer_reviews.text: I think it is adorable. Just right to relax after work. Comes in a huge box but was not that heavy. I put it together in about 45 minutes. Just attach side, feet and backrest, done. Super impressed with the 4 throw pillows... good quality and firm. Not just for looks. I'm 5'3 and I fit perfectly. But any taller and you will likely hang over end a bit. Great for small spaces and She Sheds :)
customer_reviews.author: Mola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a piece of furniture to face forward but also something comfortable to watch tv. Love the size and cuteness of this chaise!! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: sara b.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Missing assembly hardware and fabric was creased in visible places from being so tightly packed in the box. Cushion feels like sitting on a park bench and after two times sitting on it for a couple of hours it was already getting a depression that wouldn’t bounce back. This is not for actual use, even occasional. It’s now headed for a corner for looks, with a blanket draped over the fabric imperfections. Keeping only because disassembling, trying to get it packesd back in the box then arranging shipping would have been more frustrating than putting it in a dark, unused area and dealing with the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyChk

customer_reviews.title: Cute ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s alittle small and was missing the nuts to the assemble the chair. I had to buy some from the hardware store but still worth it. I like the piece and it matches my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy... at all
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio apartment so my space is very limited. This piece is small but perfect size for my needs. It’s very cute but a little awkward to put together, it will definitely take longer than a few minutes. The color is not as deep of red as pictured but still a nice color. I would not recommend for anyone that’s looking for a comfortable reading or movie-watching spot, it’s really hard.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M. Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but hard
customer_reviews.text: This small chaise lounger is the perfect size for my bedroom. While it's extremely cute, it's pretty hard. I'm hoping that it will break in a bit after some use. The legs are actually plastic, which didn't thrill me, but you really don't see them. You have to assemble the back and the side arm. One area of the arm was more challenging as it's covered by thin material. Will have hubby do those 2 bolts. That said, I really like the size and looks of this chaise. It's perfect for my space.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Color and Terrible Product Altogether
customer_reviews.text: The color is more of a pale yellow than beige. This review is not allowing me to add a picture to show. It’s ugly in my opinion. I was confused when it arrived. Turns out that some parts were INSIDE the base of the couch. Who knew!? I’ve put a lot of furniture together, and this is by far the hardest. It is incredibly difficult to get holes aligned. I have three screw holes that seemed stripped and I can’t get anything to screw in. This includes one of the feet. I hate to do it, but I may have to find a way to glue three screws in place. I’m overall really disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Small sofa for bedroom area
customer_reviews.text: Very small couch but easy to assemble.it would be a cute sofa for a small area in a bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Kokoe

customer_reviews.title: Love it cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was scared to order because of the reviews saying it wasn’t comfortable but it’s extremely comfortable I have it in my room and been lounging on it for a couple days. The only problem I have is the holes on one side of the couch are messed up so one of the screws keep falling out so I just pushed it up against the wall. Also me and my bf both sat on it and it was fine lol
customer_reviews.author: Kaijah Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: The look of the sofa is really nice the material is very nice color bright vivid however it's constructed poorly there's not enough padding in certain areas and there is no option to insert the legs on one side of the product no hole with any metal in it or anything else total disaster
customer_reviews.author: michelle andrean

customer_reviews.title: Great chaise lounge
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Wish the back and arm were a little higher. Also the main cushion isn't removable. All in all still worth the $210.
customer_reviews.author: O Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love. For the price this lounger is everything. It can fit 2 people on it, it’s super comfortable and sturdy. You can remove stains easily.
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: Firm but soft exterior material...beautiful! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled yesterday...granted it took my friend and I longer than it should have taken, and there was a wrong sized washer in the pack, this is easy to assemble, but you still probably need two people. I LOVE it though! It’s very firm, but very soft, and the back is quite a bit lower than I thought it would be, but it’s at the bottom of my queen sized bed. I really have no real complaints...love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I only received 1/2 the item! When I reached out to try to receive what I was missing, I was not contacted back. SO I returned it. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty But A Pain To Put Together
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, and how velvety soft it is, but it's a huge pain to but together. We followed the directions and for the most part were able to get the back installed, though the screws had difficulty catching so they'd screw in completely and tightly. We had to improvise to get the legs to attach. Only one of them would catch so, since my husband is a residential construction superintendent, we wound up using construction glue/liquid nails to firmly install the legs. We have animals and needed something aesthetically pleasing, serviceable and inexpensive. This fits the bill for what we need but I wouldn't want to try putting another together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: this is Junk
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture was junk first one we ordered totally not same color as showed ordered and took a month to get it. Ordered another color put it together and it is just a piece of Junk. Not sturdy and not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Mutschink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lounge and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome end chaise lounge, customer service is awesome, the feet came missing on the packaging they asked me to look under the base unit as they have a compartment or veloco lining they secure them in, I looked ever where but couldnt find them. Reached out and was delivered feet to the unit very expeditedly. Awesome quality and great price of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: s9chodia

customer_reviews.title: Petite size. Fits at the end of a queen size bed
customer_reviews.text: Great for a bedroom or small office. It isn’t terribly comfortable however it’s terrific for putting on your shoes or having someone’s sit and chat. My dogs enjoy snoozing on it because mine sits under a window.
customer_reviews.author: SAF4USC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller space
customer_reviews.text: Love the red color. Deep and rich. The pillows are a nice touch. The covers can be removed and washed. The pillows are not attached, so they can be replaced with others for a change in the look of the chaise. Not very soft seating, but a nice size comparable to a loveseat. I would have liked the feet to be wood instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin material.
customer_reviews.text: The sofa I purchased was easy to put together yet the material was so thin, it wore out during shipping and had a nice size hole. I had to return it. Its good for very small places and people, yet, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware, can’t put together!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday, but can’t put it together because multiple hardware (washers, nuts, bolts) is missing. I’ve emailed the company and will update my review based on their response and correction of this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our living room size.And it smells really good!..lol
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle,FL

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the butt to build
customer_reviews.text: Worse furniture I have ever had to assemble took three people holding it to get the holes to line up. Finally got it together and my daughter loves it so that I will keep it. Hopefully, it holds ups. I thought the other reviews had to be having a hard time for nothing boy was I wrong pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy G

customer_reviews.title: Cute chaise lounge
customer_reviews.text: I love this small chaise lounge. It came right on time, easy to set up and the color and size was just what I was looking for to go with my room's décor. At first it's a little firm but gets softer the more I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is good but legs are not so strong..there was no drilled hole on one leg..so me and my husband drilled a hole but it was so weak and unstable..we had to buy separate sofa legs.
customer_reviews.author: Saimajawad999

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dark grey chaise and when it arrived I was immediately impressed with the color. It has a blue tint to it. I did have to phone a friend to come help with construction. I wanted a firm piece of furniture and I got it with this one. Overall I am very happy with this project.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smelly
customer_reviews.text: This couch is cute, but it stinks...I have frebrezed it every day since I received it. I can't say the smell, but it is not pleasant. We are a smoke free home. I am very particular about how my home smells and this thing has my room smelling not like itself despite my multiple Scentsy warmers.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: After waiting soooo long.....disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After waiting a very long time for this order I was disappointed in how it arrived. I came home to find the box partially opened and punctured. The puncture caused a tear in the fabric, and where it was opened the fabric was a bit dirty. The item looked like it went thr hell and back. The color was perfect and the style great. I am sorry that it has to be returned. I cannot accept this item as is.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Knolls

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I live in a studio apartment, so this lounge is a PERFECT fit. The color and fabric of this product is just what I was looking for. The seller is very communicative as well. Very pleased with everything! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUT CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: It broke the mintue my boyfriend sat on it. The leg just caved into the sofa. It wad nice looking and soft to to touch but hard when sat on it. Not worth it. Im so mad i waited forever for it to ship then it breaks the same day i bought it, approximately 1 hour after assembling. I HATE returning things now im sure they want me to unassembled the damn thing and ship it back. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This Chaise lounge is absolutely beautiful. The Red is sexy, bold. It's comfortable. It comes with 4 pillows, silver trim down the arm. It only took me (a 5'5" 140 lb woman) 5 min to assemble. It's exactly what we wanted for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy!! The box came damaged and so did the item we spent 45 min fishing all the screws and washers out the inside of the chair how it got there I have no clue I think this item was a return cause it was written super judge on the box cheap isn’t always better!!
customer_reviews.author: Tah'Tiana Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: This couch sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: This couch was terrible. I’m a photographer and purchased it for my family portrait studio. The first time I had a client sit on it, it broke!! So embarrassing. Tried to fix it, and the same problem happened again. Both times were pregnant women none the less. I DO NOT RECOMMEND! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD QUALITY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not very good. It’s neither Sturdy nor Comfortable. Will not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Muthukrishnan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Chase beautiful easy to put together looks great
customer_reviews.author: rachael jackson

customer_reviews.title: Assembly screws??
customer_reviews.text: where are the assembly pieces located?? .....My sofa arrived - can't find the screws :{
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly did not match instructions. 3 people job!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was not simple. They ended up covering the holes with fabric where the back piece was supposed to go. Other than that it’s pretty and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 yr old granddaughter and her baby sister to sit on when they visit MiMi. Great deal. Perfect in my apt living room for the girls.
customer_reviews.author: J Marie Pavone

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap/ Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: All the legs are cheap and broke within 4 months. Took a lot of effort to build a sturdier base. We hardly sit on this piece of furniture. Not meant for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Newburn

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Energy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get nut and bolt to stay. Took 3 men and still couldn’t get... must’ve been defective
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t too hard to assemble. Some of the alignments where off when trying to drill screws and The legs were a little off. It’s shorter and wider than I expected but nonetheless it was a pretty nice but for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Pumphrey

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t send all the parts included.
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t send all the parts to the set. But it’s still a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tayler Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: elegant couch
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch it is perfect for making your room look elegant it is soft and a bright color love it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fertig

customer_reviews.title: Chic and classy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! The legs on the sofa are short. I purchased the WEICHUAN Black Round Solid Wood 8 inch legs from Amazon, raised the height of the sofa up and the legs are a perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: for a $200ish dollar sofa chaise it is so well built so easy to put together ans nice low back for under a window! 5 star product and the nail heads add a nice look!
customer_reviews.author: michelle marcoulier

customer_reviews.title: I gave this sofa a five star. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I bout this chair for my bedroom. I love how it is a perfect fit in my room and matches the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality - put this in my bedroom and use it all the time. It is so cute and so chic!
customer_reviews.author: Kalli Sophie Monti

customer_reviews.title: WRONG COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Dark grey is NOT grey. It looks green in person!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M

product_meta.title: Sofamania Large Classic Velvet Fabric Living Room Chaise Lounge with Nailhead Trim (Beige)
product_meta.description: Color:BeigeSofamania - Classic sleek and comfortable velvet fabric chaise lounge available in a variety of colors. Upholstered in hand picked soft and durable velvet fabric in the best colors to match your decor. Chaise features lose back coushions and nailhead trim around the scroll arm and decorative victorian style wooden legs. Minor assembly required. Perfect for lounging while watching your favorite show!
feature_bullets: Classic sleek and comfortable velvet fabric chaise lounge available in a variety of colors
Upholstered in hand picked soft and durable velvet fabric in the best colors to match your decor
Chaise features lose back coushions and nailhead trim around the scroll arm and decorative victorian style wooden legs
Minor assembly required. Perfect for lounging while watching your favorite show!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars92 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
